description.plain:
The Aces are an indie rock/pop girl group from Provo, UT, formed in 2008 and made up of four girls: Cristal Ramirez (lead vocal/guitar), Katie Henderson (lead guitar/back-up vocal), McKenna Petty (bass) and Alisa Ramirez (drums).

Currently signed to Red Bull Records, the band released their debut single “Stuck” on May 17, 2016. Shortly afterwards, their EP I Don’t Like Being Honest released on June 23, 2017. Following their hit EP, The Aces' studio album, When My Heart Felt Volcanic debuted on April 6, 2018.
